1.name: The Little Mermaid
1.description: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain in an attempt to become human and win a prince's love.

2.name: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure
2.description: Two seemingly dumb teens set off on a quest to prepare the ultimate historical presentation with the help of a time machine.

3.name: Pet Sematary
3.description: After tragedy strikes, a grieving father discovers an ancient burial ground behind his home with the power to raise the dead.

4.name: Road House
4.description: A tough bouncer is hired to tame a dirty bar.

5.name: Do the Right Thing
5.description: On the hottest day of the year on a street in the Bedford-Stuyvesant section of Brooklyn, everyone's hate and bigotry smolders and builds until it explodes into violence.

6.name: Batman
6.description: The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being the clownishly homicidal Joker.

7.name: Glory
7.description: Robert Gould Shaw leads the U.S. Civil War's first all-black volunteer company, fighting prejudices from both his own Union Army, and the Confederates.

8.name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
8.description: In 1938, after his father Professor Henry Jones, Sr. goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Professor Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. finds himself up against Adolf Hitler's Nazis again to stop them from obtaining its powers.

9.name: Parenthood
9.description: The Buckmans are a midwestern family all dealing with their lives: estranged relatives, raising children, pressures of the job, and learning to be a good parent and spouse.

10.name: Born on the Fourth of July
10.description: The biography of Ron Kovic. Paralyzed in the Vietnam war, he becomes an anti-war and pro-human rights political activist after feeling betrayed by the country he fought for.

11.name: Dead Poets Society
11.description: English teacher John Keating inspires his students to look at poetry with a different perspective of authentic knowledge and feelings.

12.name: Back to the Future Part II
12.description: After visiting 2015, Marty McFly must repeat his visit to 1955 to prevent disastrous changes to 1985...without interfering with his first trip.

13.name: The 'Burbs
13.description: An overstressed suburbanite and his fellow neighbors are convinced that the new family on the block are part of a murderous Satanic cult.

14.name: Lethal Weapon 2
14.description: Riggs and Murtaugh are on the trail of South African diplomats who are using their immunity to engage in criminal activities.

15.name: Major League
15.description: The new owner of the Cleveland Indians puts together a purposely horrible team so they'll lose and she can move the team. But when the plot is uncovered, they start winning just to spite her.

16.name: National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation
16.description: The Griswold family's plans for a big family Christmas predictably turn into a big disaster.

17.name: Ghostbusters II
17.description: The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business.

18.name: Uncle Buck
18.description: Bachelor and all round slob, Buck, babysits his brother's rebellious teenage daughter and her cute younger brother and sister.

19.name: Weekend at Bernie's
19.description: Two losers try to pretend that their murdered employer is really alive, leading the hitman to attempt to track him down to finish him off.

20.name: Field of Dreams
20.description: An Iowa corn farmer, hearing voices, interprets them as a command to build a baseball diamond in his fields; he does, and the 1919 Chicago White Sox come.

21.name: The Abyss
21.description: A civilian diving team is enlisted to search for a lost nuclear submarine and face danger while encountering an alien aquatic species.

22.name: When Harry Met Sally...
22.description: Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship.

23.name: Steel Magnolias
23.description: A young beautician, newly arrived in a small Louisiana town, finds work at the local salon, where a small group of women share a close bond of friendship, and welcome her into the fold.

24.name: Say Anything...
24.description: A noble underachiever and a beautiful valedictorian fall in love the summer before she goes off to college.

25.name: Licence to Kill
25.description: James Bond goes rogue and sets off to unleash vengeance on a drug lord who tortured his best friend, a C.I.A. Agent, and left him for dead and murdered his bride after he helped capture him.

26.name: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
26.description: The scientist father of a teenage girl and boy accidentally shrinks his and two other neighborhood teens to the size of insects. Now the teens must fight diminutive dangers as the father searches for them.

27.name: Society
27.description: An ordinary teenage boy discovers his family is part of a gruesome orgy cult for the social elite.

28.name: The Wizard
28.description: A boy and his brother run away from home and hitch cross country with the help of a girl they meet to compete in the ultimate video game championship.

29.name: Tango & Cash
29.description: Framed by their ruthless arch-nemesis, a mismatched LAPD crime-fighting duo has to put its differences aside to even the score with the evil kingpin who put them behind bars once and for all.

30.name: Majo no takkyûbin
30.description: A young witch, on her mandatory year of independent life, finds fitting into a new community difficult while she supports herself by running an air courier service.

31.name: Little Monsters
31.description: A boy discovers an incredible and gruesome world of monsters under his bed.

32.name: Sex, Lies, and Videotape
32.description: A sexually repressed woman's husband is having an affair with her sister. The arrival of a visitor with a rather unusual fetish changes everything.

33.name: The Karate Kid Part III
33.description: Ostracised villain John Kreese attempts to gain revenge on Daniel and Miyagi, with the help of a Vietnam War comrade, the wealthy owner of a toxic waste disposal business.

34.name: Look Who's Talking
34.description: After a single, career-minded woman is left on her own to give birth to the child of a married man, she finds a new romantic chance in a cab driver. Meanwhile, the point-of-view of the newborn boy is narrated through voice-over.

35.name: Next of Kin
35.description: Truman, a Chicago cop, sets out to find the killer of his brother. Meanwhile, another of his brothers, Briar (a hillbilly) decides to find the killer himself.

36.name: Driving Miss Daisy
36.description: An old Jewish woman and her African-American chauffeur in the American South have a relationship that grows and improves over the years.

37.name: Cyborg
37.description: A martial artist hunts a killer in a plague-infested urban dump of the future.

38.name: The Cook, the Thief, His Wife & Her Lover
38.description: The wife of an abusive criminal finds solace in the arms of a kind regular guest in her husband's restaurant.

39.name: Leviathan
39.description: An American deep-sea mining colony stumbles upon a sunken Soviet vessel hiding a horrific secret.

40.name: Communion
40.description: Oct.4 and Dec.26 the Strieber family drives from NYC to their cabin in the woods. Both nights there are some powerful lights outside and maybe aliens. The dad is mentally affected by the "bad dream", goes to the shrink and is hypnotized.

41.name: Sea of Love
41.description: A detective investigating a series of murders becomes involved with a woman who may be the culprit.

42.name: Dead Calm
42.description: After a tragedy, John Ingram and his wife Rae are spending some time isolated at sea, when they come across a stranger who has abandoned a sinking ship.

43.name: ¡Átame!
43.description: An unbalanced but alluring former mental patient takes a porn star prisoner in the hopes of convincing her to marry him.

44.name: The Punisher
44.description: When Frank Castle's family is murdered by criminals, he wages war on crime as a vigilante assassin known only as The Punisher.

45.name: Always
45.description: The spirit of a recently deceased expert pilot mentors a newer pilot while watching him fall in love with the girlfriend that he left behind.

46.name: Friday the 13th Part VIII: Jason Takes Manhattan
46.description: A boatful of graduating high school students headed to Manhattan accidentally pull Jason Voorhees along for the ride.

47.name: My Left Foot: The Story of Christy Brown
47.description: Christy Brown, born with cerebral palsy, learns to paint and write with his only controllable limb - his left foot.

48.name: UHF
48.description: An unemployed visionary becomes the manager of a local public station. The station becomes a success, with all sorts of hilarious sight gags and wacky humor.

49.name: Kickboxer
49.description: Kurt Sloane must learn the ancient kick boxing art of Muay Thai in order to avenge his brother.

50.name: Wild Orchid
50.description: A female lawyer becomes mesmerized by a self-made millionaire during an encounter in Rio setting off a series of erotic encounters.
